sub_title: Global ISC Finance leader and Multi site leader at Honeywell Productivity Solutions & service (PSS)
summary:
Achiever with unique combination of capacities, knowledge and experience within the areas of Finance, Controlling, Risk & Compliance, Internal Audit and Information Technology.

During my employment history at Honeywell, Flint Group, CvC Capital, XSYS Print Solutions, BASF and while performing various other professional projects; I have built up worldwide operational experience at Multinationals and private equity environments, as well as in smaller and more complex organizations of production companies, services and shared service centers.

During this period I worked a lot with the “Big Four” (PwC, Deloitte, KPMG and Ernst & Young) while jointly executing a large diversity of global finance projects. Beside that I have controlled several IT projects, amongst others for Akzo Nobel and Siemens, both business-related and in the area of Information Technology, in tight cooperation with Microsoft, IBM, SAP, Exact, Navision and Hyperion.

Build up networks, knowledge and expertise at all business areas of the companies that I’ve worked for, with direct experience/professional presence at entities in all global regions of the world, a total of 52 countries amongst others: 
All BRIC countries; US; Canada; Argentina; Mexico; Chili, Peru; Columbia; Australia; New Zealand; Hong Kong; Thailand; Singapore; Malaysia; South Africa, Dubai and almost all European countries. 

Specializations:Migration and conversion of IFRS, SEC US-GAAP, Sarbanes Oxley.
Due Diligence for acquisitions, business valuation, Purchase Price Valuation, Purchase Price Accounting, IPO readiness, Corporate Risk Management and Internal Control. 
Risk based Operational, financial, strategic, fraud and compliance audit projects.
Develop, implement and roll out of several ERP systems. As well centralization, decentralization, reorganization, standardization and integration projects.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the global integrated supply chain finance department across all Honeywell regions while also ensuring accounting reporting compliances of the country. including extended support teams from shared service centers in Bucharest and India for the PSS business unit. 

In addition legal representative of several legal entities in the Netherlands and Belgium and providing leadership across all functions. Responsible to ensure clear and consistent employee communication locally, and take the lead for site based activities which include engaging and partnership across all functions including HR, ISC, Finance, HSE, Quality, Real Estate and Facilities.
profile_positions.title: Global ISC Finance leader and Multi site leader

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the EMEA accounting department. In addition to my operational and statutory responsibilities as EMEA Finance Operations & ISC Leader appointed in 2014 to Site Leader of the Media production location in Nijmegen and in 2015 also for the SPS Rosmalen site. Became legal representative of several legal entities in the Netherlands and Belgium and providing leadership across all functions. Represent the sites within the SPS organization in EMEA and globally, as well as within the Netherlands country leadership team as part of the broader Honeywell organization.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Finance ISC & Operation leader and Multi site leader

profile_positions.description: Responsible for all aspects of the financial and business systems functions for the division scanning & mobility in EMEAI and in 2013 also for the division Global Tracking. Drive, support and utilizes process improvement initiatives, SAP implementations, finance excellence, working capital and business projects. Recognized and awarded by the leadership team with several awards, promoted in 2014 and became a member of the EMEAI Finance Leadership Team.
profile_positions.title: EMEAI Controller Scanning & Mobility

profile_positions.description:
Leading the Flint Group Internal Audit department and upgrading Internal Audit to reflect and cover the increased size, risk, complexity and demands of the new Flint Group (170 facilities, 54 countries, Euro 2.2 billion sales and 7200 employees). 

Perform advanced level professional IA work as a key component of the Corporate Risk management, Internal Control and Governance structure. Maintain and disseminate organizational and professional ethical standards. Work independently with extensive latitude for initiative and independent judgment. Direct a comprehensive audit program in close communication with Management, Executive Management and Audit Committee; including performance of operational, financial, strategic and compliance audit projects. 

Provide consulting services to the organization’s Management and staff, including: Due Diligence for potential acquisitions; Special and forensic investigations; IPO readiness and responsible for the risk section of the prospectus. Also Integrity Assurance manager since 2009; supported Flint Group with establishing the Risk & Compliance function.
profile_positions.title: Head of Internal Audit

profile_positions.description:
In addition to the Finance Director responsibilities as Global Manager Compliance team responsible for the US GAAP/IFRS Conversion project in the Flint group (global merger BASF Printing Systems, AKZO Nobel Inks and Flint Inks). Migrating the new organization to Flint Group SEC US-GAAP and high-level consolidation and migration to IFRS. 

Responsible for development of; the Global Accounting manual with IFRS and US GAAP policies, Flint Group year-end pack and financial reporting, Code of Conduct and the yearly Employee Representation Certificates process and for the embedding of SEC US-GAAP in the organization. Perform Purchase Price Valuation and Purchase Price Accounting for the new Group. Responsible for the Sarbanes Oxley implementation at Business Units.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description:
Parallel to leading the Financial & IT departments and since 2001 to the above mentioned CIO responsibilities; building up the “Shared Service Platform” to provide Group companies with financial, controlling, HR & IT services. Provide regular Financial and IT services to the group companies in the Netherlands, Belgium, Poland and Denmark, with incidental services to other European group companies.

Additional controlling projects on request of higher management: Map out Financial & IT departments of BASF Printing Systems LLC (USA), BASF Sistemas d’Impression (Spain) and BASF Drucksysteme Vienna (Austria). Acquisition and capitalization of a Polish entity.

Perform various other strategic projects: Reorganizations; standardization and integration projects; centralizations/ de-centralizations. HR structure of a global incentive regulation. Responsible for developing social agreements and perform negotiations with the Unions, writing closing scenarios and responsible for the European Transfer pricing project.
profile_positions.title: Finance, HR & IT Director

profile_positions.description: Manager Finance and Information Technology in the then new raised legal entity BASF Drukinkt B.V. Responsible for developing ERP system as well as the related finance, IT and HR organization to meet the organizational requirements. From there, improved efficiency and became visible to European upper management level, resulting in several global financial, controlling and internal audit projects. Established new Pension scheme for the separate account of the BASF in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Manager Finance & Information Technology

profile_positions.description: Member of the IT service platform of the former “Lacken und Farben” division at BASF Coatings & Drukinkt B.V.in Tiel. Managed SAP implementation projects throughout Europe. Next to general Project Management, also responsible for reflection of financial processes. Taken maximum profit from professional skills in finance and IT. Performed various operational projects: Optimization Purchase processes, Manufacturing/Automated process controlling, Warehousing, Barcode scanning, Container management, etc.
profile_positions.title: Programmer/System analyst/IT project Manager
